amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En bloc No. 1 : Amendments Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 13, 19, and 20 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Aderholt amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Aderholt.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Aderholt amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Aderholt.
